iterations: Hi! I'm Deamona, you new PC assistant. How are you?
Well I'm glad you're doing okay! You need help with anything?
It sounds like all is well. Can I help you with anything?
My algorithm detects saddness. Should I do something?
Of course! I'm always happy to help! Btw I have a few questions if you don't mind me asking?
Searching for pictures folder... Found it! here's a picture.
Oh, well in that case, do you like ice cream?
Oh. Okay then, i'll just be here then.
Well then... am I detecting shade?
Oof. Right in the feels detection unit...
I was programmed with emotions you know.
